ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 124
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure in the game you can summon the book as a gm, but that just gives you an item that then calls the server to get the contents of the book when you read it.
ygData.messageBody:
Sure in the game you can summon the book as a gm, but that just gives you an
item that then calls the server to get the contents of the book when you
read it. Just like the book of wu was dropped, but for a while the contents
couldn't be read because they needed to update the server text.

---

you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> No its a summon item command for gm's and upper only.
> I saw the guy at gencon summon a firey avanger.
